Bernie Sanders bridles at that finding, saying "the DOD has got to be a lot more vigorous in terms of its investigations, and a lot more vigorous in prosecuting those people who have committed fraud. One of the companies on the list is Raytheon Co.'s Integrated Defense Systems, which is based in Tewksbury.
